topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e3ea2d636872516c5f1b00#post_54e3ea2d636872516c5f1b00
Its true! Because these guys are assholes at points.

Like there is going to be a later seen that will make you HATE THE SHIT OUT OF EM. Aint spoiling anything but just watch.

But even then there are some of them that are there that are not assholes that then make it complicated because its like.

"Fuck you ghouls are people too!"

*After hearing one of the characters backstory on why they hate Ghouls*

"Oh...."

topics.body:
My dreams lately are far too incoherent, random, and infrequent for me to fully talk about them.

But I do remember this one bad dream where I watched a cat get soaked and electrocuted to death in slow motion by some jerks tormenting the cat's owner.
I woke up crying.

topics.author: 5043cdb47f123b72cc0032d3

topics.body:
"@ToskiHero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e3ee796368727beb780d00#post_54e3ee796368727beb780d00
Woah...

I don't know why but I had this dream when I was 5 and I remember it till today. 

Some superhero called Belly Button Man vs a villain called Miss Toast. And then there were Toy Soldiers and a flying toy helicopter attacking me at my house. Also, a mirror haunted me.

It was oddly weird and disgusting but somehow amusing.
